name: The Brewery Tour
description: Join me on a tour through several breweries and refresh yourself with Kölsch beer– in a liquid form and also in words. There will be many opportunities to learn something about the city and its cultures. Why do we call the bartender „Köbes“? How do you order a Kölsch and what exactely is Altbier? Why did it take such a long time to finish the Dom and why is the City Hall far more than only a house for the citizens? You see, we will not only have the joy of drinking but it will also be a real cultural trip!
